ARABIC: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمْ إِذَا فَرِيقٌ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمْ يُشْرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But when He removes the harm from you, a group of you associate others with their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet when He has delivered you from affliction, some of you ascribe companions to your Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But as soon as He removes the distress from you, some of you associate others with their Lord in giving thanks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When He saves you from the hardship, some of you start to believe in idols.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And then, when He averts the misfortune from you, a group among you starts ascribing partners to their Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, when He has removed the harm from you, behold! some of you associate others in worship with their Lord (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Yet when He removes the evil from you, lo! a party of you associate others with their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, when He removes the affliction from you, lo, a party of you assign associates to their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And afterward, when He hath rid you of the misfortune, behold! a set of you attribute partners to their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: yet no sooner does He relieve your distress than some among you set up other partners besides their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when He removeth the distress from you, forthwith a party of you with their Lord associate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then, when He removes the distress from you—behold, a part of them ascribe partners to their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet, when He removes the distress from you, behold! some of you turn to other gods to join with their Lord-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, when He has removed the harm from you, behold! Some of you associate others in worship with their Lord (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When He removes your affliction then some of you set up associates to their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But when He lifts the harm from you, some of you associate others with their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:54] Then when He has rid you of the misfortune, behold, a group of you attribute partners to their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And afterward, when He hath rid you of the misfortune) when He removes hardship from you, (behold! a set of you) a group of you (attribute partners to their Lord) i.e. idols,
